题目:
It’s really kind ______.
A. of you to send me such a good book
B. for you to send me such a good book
C. of you sending me such a good book
D. for you sending me such a good book
提示: 固定句型 "It’s kind of sb. to do sth." 表示“某人做某事很善良”。

题目:
My husband bought me a ______ scarf the day before yesterday.
A. new cotton red big
B. new red cotton big
C. big new red cotton
D. red cotton new big
提示: 形容词顺序：大小（big）→新旧（new）→颜色（red）→材料（cotton）。

题目:
She ran around the playground for about one hour, so she was so tired and ______.
A. asleep
B. sleepy
C. sleeping
D. sleep
提示: sleepy 表示“困倦的”，符合语境；asleep 强调“已睡着”。

题目:
______ should respect the old.
A. Young
B. The young youth
C. The young woman
D. The young
提示: "the + 形容词（young）"表示一类人（年轻人）。

题目:
The house is ______ big for a family of three.
A. much too
B. too much
C. very much
D. so
提示: much too 修饰形容词（big），表示“过于”；too much 修饰不可数名词。

题目:
The little girl doesn’t feel ______ today.
A. kind
B. nice
C. well
D. health
提示: feel well 表示“身体状态好”；health 是名词，不能直接接在 feel 后。

题目:
Mary is a ______ friend of my mother. I feel ______ happy for her.
A. true; true
B. true; truly
C. truly; true
D. truly; truly
提示: true 修饰名词（friend），truly 修饰形容词（happy）。

题目:
Which clothes do you like ______? green, red or yellow?
A. good
B. best
C. better
D. well
提示: 三者比较用最高级（best）。

题目:
Is there ______ on today’s China Daily?
A. anything interesting
B. interesting anything
C. something interesting
D. interesting something
提示: 形容词修饰不定代词（anything）需后置，疑问句中用 anything。

题目:
______ should be polite.
A. Old or young, everyone
B. Everyone, old or young
C. Man, everyone, and woman
D. Woman, everyone, man
提示: 固定表达 "Old or young, everyone" 强调“无论老少”。

题目:
The man is very ______, and he is ______ in math.
A. interested; interesting
B. interesting; interesting
C. interested; interested
D. interesting; interested
提示: interesting 修饰物（人），interested 修饰人（be interested in）。

题目:
Let’s go and share the ______ beef.
A. fine
B. well
C. nice
D. kind
提示: nice 形容食物“美味的”；fine 多指质量好，well 是副词。

题目:
After a ______ lunch, my father hurried to the office.
A. quick
B. fast
C. soon
D. rapid
提示: quick 强调动作迅速（短时间内完成）；fast 强调速度快。

题目:
The old woman lives ______ but she doesn’t feel ______.
A. alone; lonely
B. lonely; alone
C. lonely; lonely
D. alone; lone
提示: alone 表示“独自生活”，lonely 表示“感到孤独”。

题目:
The little girl is as ______ as her mother.
A. more beautiful
B. beautiful
C. much beautiful
D. less beautiful
提示: as...as 中间用形容词原级（beautiful）。

题目:
His brother is ______ than his father.
A. tall
B. tallest
C. taller
D. much tall
提示: than 提示用比较级（taller）。

题目:
The more regularly we eat, the ______ we are.
A. healthy
B. healthier
C. healthiest
D. health
提示: “the + 比较级..., the + 比较级...”结构，healthier 符合。

题目:
Oh, my God! How much ______ she looked without her hat!
A. well
B. good
C. best
D. better
提示: much 修饰比较级（better），表示“看起来好多了”。

题目:
______ have a wonderful sense of humor.
A. English
B. The English
C. The England
D. England
提示: "the + 形容词（English）"表示“英国人”整体。

题目:
We are not surprised that Mo Yan has got the Nobel Prize. Even as a child he had a ______ imagination.
A. kind
B. bad
C. funny
D. rich
提示: rich imagination 表示“丰富的想象力”，符合语境。
